text:
(1) An old truck, converted into a squatters shack, at the N.W. corner of Boston Road and Fish Ave., Bronx.

November 11, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(2) Another squatters dwelling, in an empty lot, on East 21th Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of White Plains Road, in the Bronx.

November 11, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

(3) Another lone squatters shack, at Gun Hill Road, east of Bouck Ave., in the Bronx.

November 11, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.
title: Squatters Colony - Bronx.
